title: Loose-Leash Outdoors & Focus Around Dogs
summary: Practice calm walking outside and attentive behavior near other dogs.

lessons.title: Loose-Leash 2 — Quiet Streets
lessons.objective: Walk with slack leash in low-distraction outdoor areas.
steps: Start where puppy can succeed; reward every few steps.
Use frequent turns and 'let’s go' cue.
End session while still going well.
supportGuidelines: If pulling starts: stop and wait for slack, then proceed.
Short, frequent sessions beat long ones.
lessons.safetyNotes: Avoid hot pavement; check harness fit.

lessons.title: Focus Near Dogs — At Distance
lessons.objective: Look at dogs calmly then reorient to handler.
steps: When puppy sees a dog, mark the look and reward for turning back.
Maintain a distance where puppy can succeed.
supportGuidelines: Increase distance if barking or lunging.
lessons.safetyNotes: Do not greet on tight leashes; avoid tense encounters.

lessons.title: Settle in Public — Foundations
lessons.objective: Relax on mat in calm outdoor spots (park bench/café corner).
steps: Place mat, cue Down, feed intermittently for calm.
Keep sessions short and end with a calm release.
supportGuidelines: Choose quiet times of day at first.
If restless: shorten and try again later.
lessons.safetyNotes: Mind temperature, foot traffic, and hygiene.
